name: Parachute (itch) (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.1 (beta) Details Title Parachute Model No. PR-21 Series Game & Watch (Widescreen) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date June 19, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Parachute was the first Game & Watch title released by Nintendo in the Widescreen series, which featured a bigger LCD screen and a new box design compared to the previous Silver series.

Gameplay

Save parachutists from landing in shark infested waters. Move your rescue boat left or right to catch them. If a parachutist lands in the water they will be eaten by the circling shark. Lose three parachutists and the game is over.

Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio Luca Antignano ( madrgialdesign.it ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
